scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && composer install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && symfony server:start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:host: concurrently "cd backend && symfony server:start" "cd frontend && npm run dev -- --host"
scripts.init-db: cd backend && powershell -Command "Remove-Item var\turfje.db -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --no-interaction && php bin/console app:seed-users && php bin/console app:seed-connections && php bin/console app:seed-medicines && php bin/console app:seed-patient-medicines
